name: Aoth Hahpet
pt: I'm a born gambler who can't resist taking a risk for apotential payoff. I keep multiple holy symbols on me and invoke whatever deity might come in useful at any given moment.
ideals: Material goods changes hands more often than not. Friends might stay around a bit longer.
bonds: I owe everything to my mentor - a horrible person who's probobly rotting in jail somewhere.
flaws: I can't resist swindeling people who are more powerful than me.
